Option Merge Addons
===================

This is a project that adds an addon system to option_merge enabled projects.

Installation
------------

Use pip!:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install option_merge_addons

Or if you're developing it:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -e .
    pip install -e ".[tests]"

Tests
-----

Run the helpful script:

.. code-block:: bash

    ./test.sh
